JULY 7, 1877.

Coxon. Val'kyrius @ Arendal,—37 pcs. square timber, 396 round mining timber, and 776 pcs. props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Wyburg,—29,227 pcs. boards, Harrison & Singleton. THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.

GRIMSBY.—June 20th to July 3rd.
Rakkaus @ Wyburg,—11,022 deals, &c., Price & Co.
Stettin,—172,010 oak staves, Order. Sardra @ Wyburg,—26,257 boards, E. North & Co. Swantewit @ Riga,—23,088 deals and boards, Tuplin & Co. Cramlington @ Riga,—7,210 sleeper blocks, 1,475 sawn blocks, Burt & Co.; 100 lds. lathwood, A. H. Langford. Aino @ Wyburg,—21,124 deals and boards, Price & Co. Constantine @ Riga,—659 sawn, 7,355 sleeper blocks, Burt & Co. Marmion @ Riga,—928 sawn, 8,128 sleeper blocks, Burt & Co. Edward @ Gefle,—7,834 deals and battens, Wintringham & Co. Elizabeth @ Wyburg,—10,506 deals, &c., Bennetts & Co. Elof @ Sweden,—4,724 deals and battens, R. F. Glover & Co. Olivia @ Riga, 4,907 deals, Bennetts & Co. Robinson. Olivia @ Riga,—330 sawn, 2,068 sleeper blocks, Order. Betha @ Riga,—468 sawn, 4,325 sleeper blocks, Order. Catherina @ Riga,—3,615 doors, 412 bdls. mouldings, 631 battens, Order. Riga,—6,980 deals and battens, Order. Chester @ Riga,—3,815 sleepers, 937 sawn blocks, Burt, Boulton, & Co. Cormorant @ Riga,—8,727 sleepers, 756 sawn blocks, Price & Co. Cormorant @ Riga,—2,620 sleeper blocks, Order. Cleanthes (s) @ Wyburg,—7,667 sleeper blocks, Gabriel & Son. Weardale @ Wyburg,—6,314 sleeper blocks, Gabriel & Son. Sofia @ Kotka,—14,525 deals and battens, Order. Jeederen @ Riga, 6,065 deals, Order. Sundsvall,—14,525 deals and battens, Order.

NEWCASTLE-ON-TYNE.
June 20. Frithjof @ Drammen,—347,980 pcs. staves, J. Atkinson & son & Son; 600 battens, J. W. Smith. Harmony @ Hamburg,—10,130 pit props, M. Frater.
June 21. Cort Adelaer @ Frederiksvoern,—5,079 pcs. mining timber, 540 pcs. pit props, W. Southern & Son. Kongsryggen @ Christiania, —12,487 pcs. pit props, order. Tjelwar @ Wisby,—330,049 pcs. staves, 6,424 pcs. headings, 99 pcs. deals, Order. Katrine @ Christiania,—245,816 pcs. firwood, J. Black & Co. Pylades @ Laurvig,—9,851 pcs. pit props, order.
June 22. Thetis @ Risoer,—2,393 pcs. mining timber, 34 pcs. props, J. Atkinson & Son. Speculationen @ Laurvig,—8,442 pcs. pit props, Order. Carl @ Uddevalla,—28,372 pcs. pit props, P. Bell & Co. Gossen @ Uddevalla,—8,804 pcs. pit props, Hall Bros. Uller @ Memel,—3,840 pcs. deals, Hardy Bros. Terra Nova @ Sannesund,—7,486 pcs. pit props, Hall Bros. Stadt @ Drammen,—quantity staves and mining timber, Hall Bros.
June 23. Immanuel @ Gothenburg,—quantity staves Order. Stjernon @ Drammen,—7,746 battens, M. A. Lohre. Fortuna @ Frederiksvoern,—8,686 pcs. pit props, W. Southern. Pilen @ Rusoer,—4,248 pcs. pit props, Hall Bros.
June 25. Mathilda @ Slite,—143,756 pcs. firwood, J. Black & Co. Helga @ Halmstad,—10,613 pcs. pit props, J. Atkinson. Colibri @ Arendal,—3,245 pcs. pit props, H. Hoeck. Carlscrona,—7,473 pcs. pit props, H. Hoeck.
June 26. Success @ Vefsen,—792,666 pcs. staves, J. Black & Co. Goteburg @ Gothenburg,—quantity pit props and staves, P. Bell & Co. Auguste Blanche @ Gothenburg,—quantity firwood, sawn and hewn, Order.
June 28. Gyfle @ Pensacola,—1,151 pcs. pine timber, 546 pcs. deals, Rennoldson & Capper.
June 29. J. H. Epping @ Riga,—14,780 pcs. lathwood, Order. Sunderland @ Oscarshamn,—quantity pit props, P. Bell & Co. Ida Charlotte @ Oscarshamn,—quantity of staves and headings, Order. Isabella @ Quebec,—97 pcs. oak, 56 pcs. elm, 63 pcs. red pine, 857 pcs. white pine, 2,596 pcs. deals, 931 pcs. deal ends, Farley, Clark & Berkley. Emma @ Hallstra,—7,207 pcs. deals and head-ings, 24,976 pcs. staves, J. Black & Co. Haabets @ Oscarshamn,—11,376 pcs. pit props, R. Thiedman & Co. Haabets @ Oscarshamn,—19,974 pcs. deals and headings, Order.
July 3. Avance @ Riga,—3,219 pcs. deal ends, Order. Samfrid @ Wyburg,—3,526 pcs. deals and battens, Order. Urda @ Laurvig, —1,149 pcs. mining timber, Order. Varde @ Laurvig,—1,538 pcs. staves, Order. Varde @ Oscarshamn,—15,400 pcs. pit props, W. Southern & Son. Varde @ Oscarshamn,—quantity birchwood, pit props, W. Southern & Son. Triton @ Gothenburg,—quantity birchwood and staves, quantity pit staves, Order. Triton @ Gothenburg,—quantity birchwood and staves, and poles, P. Osbeck; quantity pit props, P. Bell & Co.

Kersvik,—3,173 pcs. pit props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Maria @ Uddavalla,—3,173 pcs. pit props, E. S. Jobson & Co. Charlotte @ Uddavalla,—3,173 pcs. props, E. S. Jobson & Co. BRISTOL.
Seladen @ Drammen,—95,021 boards, Jones & Nash. Primula @ Fredrikstadt,—36,270 boards, G. M. Barnes. Ringwood @ Charlotte Town, P.E.I.,—1,500 deals, &c., 686 boards, Pearse & Son. Themis @ St. John, N.B.,—29,993 deals, &c., S. B. Hume @ St. John, N.B.,—5,700 palings, Emblin & Jones. David Taylor @ Dorchester, N.B.,—14,597 deals, May & Hassell. S. B. Hume @ Cocagne, N.B.,—21,248 deals, &c., 7,875 palings, 2,720 palings, G. M. Barnes & King. Arctic @ Richibucto,—11,575 deals and ends, Richards, Power, & Co. Savannah @ Pensacola,—1,851 pcs. sawn, 494 deals pitch pine, 2,045 ends, 1,124 ends, G. M. Barnes. Cocagne, N.B.,—14,597 deals, 16,064 pine deals and ends, Robinson, Son & Co.

SUNDERLAND.—June 20th to July 3rd.
Sarpsborg @ Holmstrand,—6,402 pi. props, Rayner & Moller.
Elizabeth @ Holmstrand,—25,297 pit props, Rayner & Moller.
Frederique @ Holmstrand,—7,278 pit props, Rayner & Moller. Ellida
